name: Ancestor's Blessing
description:
Tired of endless office work? Want to return to nature where your roots are? Sometimes you just need a little push in the form of a seed.

Global Game Jam 2023 theme "Roots"  inspired us to make this 2D roguelike root 'em up game with retro style.

Credits:

Neo Aarnikotka : Art - linktree
Laimonas Suchockas: Code
Niklas Lehikoinen: Code
Heikki Parviainen: Design - Artstation
Ali Hosseini: Music & SFX - bandcamp
